name: BlackBox (itch) (lower third)
description:
Developed for Global Game Jam 2020 in 48h

Headphones Recommended

You are an engineer, who has been forced into an unknown facility. Something is wrong with it. Your only way to escape is to repair as you go. But what are you repairing?

Credits:

Markus Aksli (Game Design, Writing, Programming)

Mattias Aksli (Writing, Programming)

Volodymyr Chelpan (Art, Character Design, Animation)

Siim Püvi (Audio)

Rasmus Lepp (Miscellaneous)

Nikita Udalov (Miscellaneous)
